idioma_elegido:
Success. 
Language has been changed correctly.
comandoNoRec: Not recognized as a command. Please use 'git help' to get more help.
instrucciones: Type your git commands (type 'exit' para close the Minigit):
git_push:
-git push: 
Send the local released changes to a remote repository.
This permit other collaborators can see the changes and stay 
synchronized the share repository state
git_add:
-git add: 
Add changes to the prepared area to be included int he next commit
Before you realize the commit, the changes must be added to the preparation area using this command.
git_branch:
-git branch: 
Lis t all the local branches of the actual repository, with the current branch highlighted. 
You can also use to create and eliminate branches.
git_status:
-git status: 
You can see the changes that you realized in your work area and wich are prepared to be included in the next commit.
git_help:
-help: 
Shows information about all the available commands.
lang_help:
-lang: 
 It help you to change the language of the interface.
  lang es: Change the interface to spanish. 
  lang en: Change the interface to english
